requirement.original: Convert Jinko Hotel Booking MCP to Claude skill for hotel search
requirement.clarified: Create a Claude skill that wraps Jinko Hotel Booking MCP and configure it for accommodation agent. The skill should handle hotel search with real-time pricing, availability, and booking links.
requirement.what: Create Jinko skill using progressive disclosure pattern and integrate with accommodation agent
requirement.why: Enable comprehensive hotel search with 2M+ hotels worldwide, real-time pricing, and facility filtering

included: Create jinko-hotel skill file with progressive disclosure pattern
Implement hotel search and filtering tools
Set up secure credential management pattern

success_criteria: Jinko Hotel skill file exists in .claude/commands/
Accommodation agent configured to use jinko-hotel skill
Credential management follows security best practices
constraints: Must integrate without breaking current functionality

root_cause_analysis.symptom: Accommodation agent lacks structured hotel data
root_cause_analysis.root_cause: No integration with hotel booking APIs for pricing and availability

development_approach.strategy: Create skill using progressive disclosure pattern. Configure accommodation agent to invoke skill.

mcp_info.name: Jinko Hotel Booking MCP
tools: filter_by_facilities - Filter by WiFi, pool, parking, etc.
